description: 2 x Maple (2 and 3 of applicant's plan) - Reduce spread by 30%, thin by 30%. Group G35 of Tree Preservation Order.  1 x Cherry (9 of applicant's plan) - Reduce by 50% as specified. Standing in group G34 of Tree Preservation Order.  1 x Chestnut (12 of applicant's plan) - Lift to give 3M headroom over parking bays. Standing in group G34 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Chestnut (19 of applicant's plan) - Lift to provide 3M headroom all round. Standing in group G32 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Oak (18 of applicant's plan) - Lift to provide clearance from building by removing 1 low branch growing towards building. Standing in group G34 of Tree Preservation Order.
